tool_description: Feeling nostalgic? Generate the same old alphanumeric captchas.
name: Captcha
title: Captcha

api_list.name: Generate Captcha
api_list.description: Generates a captcha and returns a UUID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://captcha2.p.rapidapi.com/captcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "captcha2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://captcha2.p.rapidapi.com/captcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "captcha2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Verify the captcha
